prompts: Create a fire-type Pokemon with a muscular build and vibrant flames for arms.
I want a Pokemon that combines elements of fire and combat, showcasing bright red and yellow colors.
Generate a creature that embodies fiery energy, featuring a robust physique and striking color palette.
Make a Pokemon that stands out with its fiery appearance and intimidating stance for battles.
Imagine a powerful fire-type Pokemon with unique fiery features and an explosive personality.
Design a Pokemon that looks fierce yet colorful, perfect for a trainer seeking a strong companion.
Show me a muscular fire-type Pokemon that radiates heat and energy through its vibrant colors.

distinctive_features: Flame-like protrusions on the head and arms
Pink belly contrasting with fiery colors
